verbose_text: Exposure to DAPT at 3 years was associated with reduced all-cause mortality (hazard ratio [HR] : 0.067, 95% confidence interval [CI] : 0.027-0.162, p < 0.001) and reduced recurrent AMI (HR : 0.02, 95% CI : 0.003-0.173, p < 0.001).
